name: JiPS
description: JiPS - Jigsaw Puzzle Ships. Classic Jigsaw Puzzle Game with 30 stunning pictures of sea scenery with sailing warships of various ages and countries.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3/ Vista / 7 / 8 32 and 64 bit Processor: Intel or AMD Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
